title: Futbol Americas: Chicharito out of Qatar World Cup
description:
On Thursday’s episode of Futbol Americas, Herculez Gomez and Sebastian Salazar are joined by Mauricio Pedroza to react to Tata Martino closing the door on Chicharito's return to El Tri and his decision of Mexico's No. 9's for Qatar World Cup. The guys then analyze Marcelo Flores' loan move to Real Oviedo from Arsenal U-20. Then we talk about the club friendlies across the U.S. Next, USWNT midfielder Ashley Sanchez joins the show for an exclusive interview where she talks about the United States' CONCACAF W Championship title win, her career, and her relationship with club teammate Trinity Rodman.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Tata Martino closes the door on possible Javier Hernandez return to El Tri
